name: Super Hang Out: with Corris!
description:
You, the Evil Overlord, have finally invited the Elf Maiden Corris to Hang Out in your dungeon! Corris awaits whatever torture you have for her with excitement! Fortunately, you have The Feather, allowing you to have fun with Corris for as long as you want!

- Use your mouse to tease Corris with your feather! Whenever you use the feather, Corris squeals with excitement!

- Is Corris making too much noise? Muffle her excited squeals to keep her quiet, but just enough so that she'll still let out a little yelp!

- Keep going as long as you want! Corris is here to hang out with you! Your fun is recorded as long as you keep the game running!

Made in Game Maker Studio

Game, Art, Sound Effects by Thomas "Jetstorm4" L.
